p: Ganoderic acid AW1 ( 151) (Fig. 31), a new lanostane triterpene, was isolated from the whole organism of the Ganoderma sp. (Ganodermataceae) collected from Egypt [ 102]. This compound exhibited good anti-malarial activity against the D6 strain of P. falciparum with an IC 50 value of 257.8 nM with no cytotoxicity up to the concentration of 9 μM. The compound also tested positive against the W2 strain with an IC 50 value of 2000 nM [ 102].
